Topic.Title: Are HTML games with ads allowed to be uploaded ?

Posts.EditableText: Hi, I was wondering if I developed a text adventure game with ads integrated in certain parts of the story, would I be allowed to upload it here for others to play? Thanks!
Posts.HTML: Hi, I was wondering if I developed a text adventure game with ads integrated in certain parts of the story, would I be allowed to upload it here for others to play? Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: What sort of thing would you be advertising?
Posts.HTML: What sort of thing would you be advertising?

Posts.EditableText: I meant a story with something like Unity Ads implemented into it. It's just a thought as of right now, since I'm still in the beginning stages of developing the story.
Posts.HTML: I meant a story with something like Unity Ads implemented into it. It's just a thought as of right now, since I'm still in the beginning stages of developing the story.
